customers.q: Do I need to install an app?
customers.a: No app required. You scan a QR code at the counter and your stamps are saved to your phone’s browser wallet.

customers.q: How do I redeem a reward?
customers.a: Once you collect enough stamps, show your phone to the cashier. They tap 'Redeem' and your reward is applied instantly.

customers.q: What if I switch or lose my phone?
customers.a: Use the same email or phone number and your stamps sync back. No account passwords needed.
Yes. We only store what’s needed to track your stamps. No location tracking, no resale of personal data.

customers.q: Does it work at different stores?
customers.a: Yes. gobonki works at cafés, barbers, restaurants—each business can have its own card and rewards.
You can open your card offline, but stamping/redeeming requires a quick online check to prevent fraud.

businesses.a: About 2 minutes. Create a card, set your reward, print your QR. That’s it—no POS integration required.
No. Any phone or tablet that can open a browser works. Staff just scans or taps the customer’s QR.
QR + server checks prevent duplicates. Optionally require staff PIN or device approval for extra control.

businesses.q: Can I customize rewards and branding?
businesses.a: Yes. Set stamp count, reward text, brand colors and even whitelabel on paid tiers.
Start free. Paid features like whitelabel and analytics are optional and transparent—no transaction fees.

businesses.q: Does it integrate with my POS?
businesses.a: Not required. If you want POS sync, we offer a simple export and REST API on higher tiers.
